label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a bug in the admin module where the config_dump and init_dump admin endpoints would return an empty response when called with empty query parameters (e.g., /config_dump?resource=&mask=&name_regex=).

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a RELEASE_ASSERT in TLS when using auto_sni if the downstream request :authority header was longer than 255 characters.
